column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love noodles. And I love Jinya's Cha Cha Cha Garlic Ramen. The broth is thick
column3: and flavorful. The thick noodles are dense and chewy. The pork in the ramen is a mix mix of fatty and lean
column4: be prepared. I really shouldn't have written this review not in the restaurant because it's making me hungry.
